rundown: 7-1 W vs Miami Marlins Joey Wentz: 5.1 innings, 1 earned run, 4 hits, 0 HR, 2 strikeouts Batters: Marcell Ozuna (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Michael Harris II (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Matt Olson (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a convincing victory over the Miami Marlins, showcasing a strong offensive performance and solid pitching. Key highlights include Marcell Ozuna's impactful three-RBI game, Michael Harris II and Matt Olson both contributing with home runs, and Joey Wentz effectively limiting the Marlins to just one run over 5.1 innings. The Braves' ability to capitalize on scoring opportunities was crucial in this dominant win.
